title: Cardi B. Photo Op.  Will Smith Throwback picture.  Oprah Speaks about the TRUTH.  Sheryl Underwood stops by.  Steve gives us his Closing Remarks which talks about association and more.
itunes:title: Cardi B. Photo Op.  Will Smith Throwback picture.  Oprah Speaks about the TRUTH.  Sheryl Underwood stops by.  Steve gives us his Closing Remarks which talks about association and more.
description:
Cardi B. refuses a photo op with a belligerent fan. Will Smith's ex-wife posts a throwback photo of their family during happier times. Oprah Winfrey delivers the commencement speech to USC students and highlights the TRUTH. Sheryl Underwood gives her opinion about the Royal Wedding. The Closing Remarks talks about association and more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
